name: 2 Player Duels
description:
(Game is currently in development)

I have lots more ideas so make sure to come back later some of these are:

Level editor

Better graphics

Controls:

    Player 1:

        AD - Move left and right

        W - Jump

        S - Fire

    Player 2:

        Left And Right Arrows - Move left and right

        Up arrow - Jump

        Down arrow - Fire
